alert.note: Alert for Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Burke and southwestern Barnwell Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burke County Airport, or near Waynesboro, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Plant Vogtle, Sardis, Midville, Alexander, Burke County Airport, Gough, Girard, Vidette, Di- Lane Wildlife Management Area, Magruder, Shell Bluff, Colemans Lake and Rosier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
